title: Frederick Vreeland, Diplomat and Spy Who Served With Style, Dies at 98
summary_full: A son of the influential fashion editor Diana Vreeland, he had an upbringing well suited to his overt and covert duties during the Cold War.
summary_public: A son of the influential fashion editor Diana Vreeland, he had an upbringing well suited to his overt and covert duties during the Cold War.
